original: Rūpaṁ na aniccaṁ na saṅkhataṁ na paṭiccasamuppannaṁ na khayadhammaṁ na vayadhammaṁ na virāgadhammaṁ na nirodhadhammaṁ na vipariṇāmadhammanti?
analyzed: rūpam na aniccam na saṅkhatam na paṭicca samuppannam na khaya dhammam na vaya dhammam na virāga dhammam na nirodha dhammam na vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: nanu rūpaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
analyzed: nanu rūpam aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam khaya dhammam vaya dhammam virāga dhammam nirodha dhammam vipariṇāma dhamman ti

original: vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: vipariṇāma dhamma no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: nanu yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: Hañci yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: hañci yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: “rūpaṁ aniccaṁ”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: rūpam anicca no ca vata re vattabbe
nanu aññātāvindriyam aniccam saṅkhatam pe vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: Hañci aññātāvindriyaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci aññātāvindriyam aniccam saṅkhatam paṭicca samuppannam khaya dhammam vaya dhammam virāga dhammam nirodha dhammam vipariṇāma dhamma no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Nanu yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: nanu yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: Hañci yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: hañci yat aniccam tam dukkham vuttam bhagavatā

original: “aññātāvindriyaṁ aniccaṁ”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: aññātāvindriyam anicca no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Ekādhippāyena methuno dhammo paṭisevitabbo, arahantānaṁ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṁ
analyzed: eka adhippāyena methunaḥ dhammo paṭisevitabbaḥ arahantānam vaṇṇena amanussāḥ methuna

original: dhammaṁ paṭisevanti, bodhisatto issariyakāmakārikāhetu vinipātaṁ gacchati, gabbhaseyyaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭisevanti bodhisatto issariya kāma kārikā hetu vinipātam gacchati gabbhaseyya

original: okkamati, dukkarakārikaṁ akāsi, aparantapaṁ akāsi, aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisi, atthi
analyzed: okkamati dukkara kārikam akāsi aparantapam akāsi aññam satthāram uddisi atthi

original: na rāgo rāgapatirūpako, atthi na doso dosapatirūpako, atthi na moho mohapatirūpako
analyzed: na rāgaḥ rāga patirūpakaḥ atthi na dosaḥ dosa patirūpakaḥ atthi na mohaḥ moha patirūpakaḥ

original: atthi na kileso kilesapatirūpako, rūpaṁ aparinipphannaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ aparinipphannanti.
analyzed: atthi na kilesaḥ kilesa patirūpakaḥ rūpam a parinipphannam aññātāvindriyam a parinipphannanti
